markdown: ###### Minor positive repution with [Neketaka](/neketaka/);[Orishia](/orishia/); | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Beina | conc = | next = Bounty - The Steel Preacher | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Naga | guid = 07ee3f5c-fa44-4eaa-bc51-86cbb305d37d }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis One of the local nāga tribes put out a bounty on Flamewalker Vessali, a flame nāga shaman who betrayed and murdered one of her own. She was last seen slithering around the eastern parts of the Kua o Rikuhu island chain, occupying her latest conquest, one of the eastern isles of the Kua o Rikuhu chain. Nungata will pay a good price for her head. ## Walkthrough * Flamewalker Vessali is located at 13° 43' S, 61° 18' E, eastern [Kua o Rikuhu Islands](/kuaORikuhuIslands/). She is accompanied by a [Flame nāga marauder](/flameNagaMarauder/) and a [Flame nāga archer](/flameNagaArcher/). Drops [Orishia](/orishia/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Naga.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | One of the local nāga tribes put out a bounty on Flamewalker Vessali, a flame nāga shaman who betrayed and murdered one of her own. She was last seen slithering around the eastern parts of the Kua o Rikuhu island chain. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Flamewalker Vessali.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Flamewalker Vessali presently occupies her latest conquest, one of the eastern isles of the Kua o Rikuhu chain. Nungata will pay a good price for her head. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Nungata.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Flamewalker Vessali is no more. Nungata in Serpent's Crown in Neketaka will be pleased to learn of it. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Flamewalker Vessali and claimed the bounty reward from Nungata. |}
